Recent News

2021-01-01 We start of the year with a (for now visual) update to the archive. In the trace overview you can now filter on high-level trace properties. We are working to enable this functionality as soon as possible.

2020-12-02 Added a workflow trace from Galaxy Europe. Thank you, Jaro Bosch for your contribution.

Our Mission

1. Build a community for sharing valuable traces.
2. Improve academic and industrial work.
3. Improve education through useful & representative traces.
